example.description: This example enables cross-zone load balancing for the specified load balancer.
This example disables connection draining for the specified load balancer.

example.code: PS C:\> Edit-ELBLoadBalancerAttribute -LoadBalancerName my-load-balancer ` >> -AccessLog_Enabled $true ` >> -AccessLog_S3BucketName my-logs-bucket ` >> -AccessLog_S3BucketPrefix my-app/prod ` >> -AccessLog_EmitInterval 60
example.description: This example enables access logging for the specified load balancer.
